menus

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • menus.Menu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeathMenu, DifficultyMenu, FinishedLevelMenu, GodScreen, LevelMenu, MultiplayerMenu, PauseMenu, StartMenu

    public abstract class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Navaneet Kadaba The Menu class is responsible for providing certain menus such as the StartMenu, PauseMenu, and DeathMenu to the user, which are responsible for giving the user a specific list of options.
